text: Rero uwushaka yuko Imana imurongora, imwugururira igikiriza ciwe c’ukuba umu Isilamu, nayo uwo Imana yashakiye kuzimira, igira igikiriza ciwe kuba kiremereye kibona gusa ingorane zihambaye nkuko ari umuntu aduga mw’Ijuru, uku rero niko Imana ibashirako umwanda hejuru ya batayemera bimwe vy’ukuri
